mapper.update: insert into membertbl (ID, PW, EMAIL, NAME, JOINDATE) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{name}, #{joindate});

create table MEMBERTBL ( IDX INTEGER auto_increment, ID CHARACTER VARYING(20) not null constraint MEMBERTBL_PK unique, PW CHARACTER VARYING(100) not null, EMAIL CHARACTER VARYING(100), HASEMAILAUTHED BOOLEAN default 0 not null, NAME CHARACTER VARYING(30) not null, JOINDATE TIMESTAMP not null, MODIFYDATE TIMESTAMP default LOCALTIMESTAMP not null, constraint MEMBERTBL_PK2 primary key (IDX) );
